column1: it will update to the newest build but you will have to download the updated crack every time it updates. sorry"
,Revrant,2009-12-12T17:18Z,"Thanks, though HomerSp on Demonoid made one that he only had to update every so often, it was just a patcher, would that be easier?"

,f4hqu,2009-12-26T16:09Z,"FYI - for anyone running Windows 7, you must right click the patch and choose to run as the admin, otherwise you'll receive a message stating that the file is in use and cannot be patched. "

,Arcusan,2010-02-15T05:24Z,"Nope, doesn't work. I'm using Windows 7, running as administrator and it takes me to the login page and I can login, but when I click my name to login, it gets to initializing user interface and it crashes. Looks like an issue with MSVCR90.dll.
